row.process:
:INC JOBI.TEST_PARAM_VAR_SECURITY_LEVEL, NOFOUND=IGNORE :DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 8 :SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &VARAIDLIST# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&VARA_ACTIVITY_WINDOWS_LIST#) :PROCESS &VARAIDLIST# : SET &LANCEMENT# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&VARAIDLIST#,1) : IF "&LANCEMENT#" = "0#0#NODATA#1900-01-01 00:00:00.000#1900-01-01 00:00:00.000#1900-01-01 00:00:00.000#0#NODATA" OR "NODATA#0#NODATA####0#NODATA" : PRINT "NO DATA" : ELSE : PRINT "SUPPRESSION : &LANCEMENT#"
: SET &SEARCHSTRING#="#" : FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&LANCEMENT#,&SEARCHSTRING#) : SET &EH_IDNR# = &STRINGS#[&VAR#] : SET &ID# = DEACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(&EH_IDNR#,FORCED) : PRINT "&ID#" : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &VARAIDLIST#
